title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs with a single CLI, macOS/Linux/Win, REST & Go API, model library (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma…).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; sync & async clients, streaming, chat & embed endpoints.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; promises, streams, chat, pull, delete.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings, structured output.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured web UI for Ollama: chat UI, model manager, multi-user, RAG, plugins.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, POJO mapping, Android tested.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, delete, streaming support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Rust; browse, chat, switch models inside terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production Helm chart for Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, Open WebUI, Postgres, Nginx, GPU support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, delete, streaming via HttpClient.

title: ollama-codellama-vscode
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension using CodeLlama via Ollama for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG demo with Ollama, LangChain & Chroma; PDF ingestion, local embeddings.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot starter auto-configuring Ollama Java client; injectable ChatModel bean.

title: ollama-node
summary: Community TypeScript NPM wrapper around Ollama REST API with strong types & streams.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama Python client; 50k+ weekly downloads.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for Ollama ecosystem news, model releases, troubleshooting, showcases.

title: ollama-hackernews
summary: Hacker News discussion on Ollama v0.1.38 release highlighting new tool-use API.
